snippet: Potential flaws in a new risk calculator may put millions on statin drugs unnecessarily.
abstract: Editorial notes potential flaws in a new online risk calculator for heart attack or stroke that may put tens of millions of healthy individuals on cholesterol-lowering statin drugs unnecessarily; urges patients who need treatment to wait until heart organizations, who released calculator, reassess its possible flaws and decide how best to fix it.
lead_paragraph: Potential flaws in a new risk calculator may put millions on statin drugs unnecessarily.
